column4: Is there a reason why grub breaks my mbr? I tried instaling 11.04 like 6 times already, and I can't boot into linix or win7 at all, so I have to re-install 10.10 to fix my mbr so I can at least use my system.
boot to liveCD and reinstall grub2
remeber to MD5 tes the ISO
and check the CD for defects
sounds about right, I always clean install
may be the cause of the issues
